name: Another one bites the dust
description:
Every 10 seconds, you will lose 1 hp and get a fully loaded new weapon.

Pickup items around the map to heal or dropped from enemies to heal yourself.

Let’s see how long you will survive.

W,A,S,D to move

Mouse to aim

Left Mouse button to shoot

Space bar to jump and double jump

Right Mouse button to dash

BGM: Yoshikage Kira's Theme

For Ludum Dare 51:  https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/an-other-one-bites-the-dust
